00007 int modules::navigator::LoadConfigFile(const char* filename){
00008     // Check we haven't already opened a modules file
00009     if(fModulesLoaded ==true) {
00010             cout<<"Error: Loading a new modules file, when one was already loaded"<<endl;
00011             return 1;
00012     }
00013     // Read in the file and dump the processed options
00014     modules::reader modules_file;
00015     modules_file.ReadFile(filename);
00016     modules_file.PrintAllOptions();
00017 
00018     // Check the file contained at least one module
00019     size_t num_modules=modules_file.GetNumModules();
00020     if(num_modules==0){
00021             cout<<"Warning: No modules were requested for use, so there's nothing to be done!"<<endl;
00022             return 2;
00023     }
00024     cout<<"Number of modules requested: "<<num_modules<<endl;
00025 
00026     // Loop over each requested module and build it
00027     // If we have any problems making a module then stop running
00028     modules::factory* mgr = modules::factory::Instance();
00029     std::string name;
00030     modules::options* opts;
00031     BaseModule* mod=NULL;
00032     for(unsigned i=0;i<num_modules;i++){
00033             name = modules_file.GetModule(i);
00034             opts =  modules_file.GetOptions(i);
00035             cout<<"Creating module: "<<name<<endl;
00036             cout<<"With options:"<<endl;
00037             opts->DumpOptions("  ");
00038             mod = mgr->createModule(name,opts);
00039             if(mod) AddModule(name, mod);
00040             else return 3;
00041     }
00042 
00043     // Everything finished ok
00044     fModulesLoaded=true;
00045     return 0;
00046 }
00047 
00048 void modules::navigator::AddModule(const std::string& name, BaseModule* mod){
00049     fModules.push_back(std::make_pair(name,mod));
00050     fModulesSearch.insert(std::make_pair(name,mod));
00051 }
